posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Quick StartQuick Start guess1Quick Start Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 使用Github Pages + Hexo 搭建个人博客学习
posts.slug: 使用Github Pages+Hexo搭建个人博客学习
posts.path: 2018/05/26/使用Github Pages+Hexo搭建个人博客学习/
posts.permalink: https://liqizhao.github.io/2018/05/26/使用Github Pages+Hexo搭建个人博客学习/
posts.text: 简单的知识普及，Github Pages是依托于 Github 本身的技术服务经验开发出来的，官方网站上的介绍是Websites for you and your projects，包括create a blog功能在内.Github Pages官网地址 Hexo是一个快速、简洁且高效的博客框架。Hexo 使用 Markdown（或其他渲染引擎）解析文章，在几秒内，即可利用靓丽的主题生成静态网页。Hexo官网地址Hexo中文文档地址 Node，git安装1Quick Start Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Quick Start Quick StartQuick Start
